message: Having trouble understanding how desire and ability relate. Can someone give an example of a film (or hypothetical) with this setup? Gracias!
MC Crucial Element = Desire and IC Crucial Element = Ability. MC Resolve is Change.

Aliens - Ripley is driven by her fears of the aliens (negative of Desire), she Changes when she gains the Ability to fight back (Hicks teaching her to use the gun, using her Ability to work the big yellow forklift, etc.)
Either get the ability, or lose the desire.
Wait, you desire to understand this, but you don't have the ability?

In a love story for example:the boy likes this girl (attraction as solution) and his inner need to spare her from trouble/heartache (Desire as crucial element) needs to change, as the girl, having matured and lived through a series of broken relationships with capacity to love truly still intact (ability as crucial) can accept him even if he had left his loveless marriage (repulsion as problem).
